text_block_list.text: Since Matikanetannhauser isn't feeling well, I decided to let her rest in the infirmary.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, Trainer. I'm causing you worry.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll rest properly and get better properly. Well then, good night~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm, u~n? This is... umm...

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: Welcome back~. You're going to rest slowly today, right~?

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text: There's also your favorite full course. Eat until you're full!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, huh...!? Why are Mom and Dad here!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, more importantly, a full course... We're supposed to be a teishoku restaurant though...

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Father
text_block_list.text: He~re, your favorite sea urchin soupe de poisson, and the main dish, sautéed sea bream~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa...! All dishes I don't know!?

text_block_list.name: Tannhauser's Mother
text_block_list.text: What are you saying. You've always loved French full courses, haven't you~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I've never eaten any of these! What's sea urchin po-wa-po-wa!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want the usual teishoku! It's not my home unless it's that taste, normally delicious and normally makes me happy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So give back the 'normal taste,' God~~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, huh!? This is...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Banzai! I've returned to my usual daily life~~!
Matikanetannhauser had successfully escaped from the bad dream and felt refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But... maybe once in a while! Ehehe, thank you for the meal♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, upon closer look, it's a wax sample! If I eat this, I'll break out in hives!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh... a dream...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
In the end, I wonder what kind of food it was.
Sea urchin fluff...
Due to having a hazy dream, Matikanetannhauser couldn't get back into form...
